entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:58 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 09:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of ice pellets. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
